tools.title: AI Dataset Generator
tools.description: Generative AI tool for creating synthetic crack datasets to overcome data scarcity.

tools.title: Crack Segmentation
tools.description: Deep Learning model (FPN/EfficientNet) for pixel-level segmentation of complex surface cracks.

tools.title: Lane Detection and Rutting Assessment
tools.description: Automated lane boundary detection and multi-algorithm rut depth measurement (AASHTO, Wire, Straight-Edge).

tools.title: Auto-PASER
tools.description: LLM-driven qualitative assessment engine for automating standard PASER rating generation.

tools.title: Performance Assessment
tools.description: An Integrated Fuzzy MCDM System for Comprehensive Pavement Performance Assessment.

tools.title: Synthetic Experts
tools.description: A tool to generate high-fidelity synthetic expert datasets for pavement engineering decision-making.
